speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Lisa from Secure Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. What’s this call about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. First, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your identity. You currently have a balance of $250 on your account. Would you like to discuss a payment option?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment today. What are my options?

speaker: Agent
text: You can pay by credit card, bank transfer, or set up a payment plan. Which would you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to pay by credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can help you with that. Please provide your credit card details.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! I've processed your payment. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome! Have a great day!
